posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: turnJs
posts.text: Turn Js이북 페이지 넘김 효과 라이브러리참고url데모http://www.turnjs.com/ 문서https://github.com/blasten/turn.js/wiki/Referencehttp://www.turnjs.com/turnjs4-api-docs.pdf 요구사항: Jquery http://www.turnjs.com/ 에서 라이브러리 다운로드 Javascript 예제1234567$('.flipbook').turn({ display: 'double', gradients: true, acceleration: true, duration: 1500, elevation: 50,}) HTML 예제1234567891011121314151617181920<div class="flipbook"> <div class="page"> <div class="coverTitle">Title01</div> </div> <div class="page"> <div class="pageWrapper"> <div class="pageContent">Page01!!</div> </div> </div> <div class="page"> <div class="pageWrapper"> <div class="pageContent">Page02!!</div> </div> </div> <div class="page"> <div class="pageWrapper"> <div class="pageContent">Page03!!</div> </div> </div></div> page 클래스로 구분하여 페이지가 구분된다페이지 넘김 효과 구현 가능

posts.title: javascript time sleep
posts.text: 자바스크립트에서 time sleep 사용time sleep일정시간 쉬고 다음을 실행할수있다. 12345678function sleep(delay) { var start = new Date().getTime() while(new Date().getTime() < start + delay);}sleep(1000)console.log('text01')sleep(1000)console.log('text02')

posts.title: hexoblog start
posts.text: Hexo Starthexo 설치 1npm install hexo-cli -g hexo 초기화 123hexo init blogcd blognpm install hexo 로컬서버 1hexo server theme 설치 12cd themesgit clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus.git 추가 필요 패키지 설치 bulma-stylus, hexo-renderer-inferno, inferno, inferno-create-element … _config.yml theme 설정 1theme: icarus github pages 저장소 생성 1{yourname}.github.io _config.yml github 설정 1234deploy: type: git repo: {your github url} branch: master hexo 정적파일 생성 및 배포 12hexo generatehexo deploy
